member.name: P:Chromely.Core.ChromelySchemeHandler.IsSecure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether is secure. If true the scheme will be treated with the same security rules as those applied to "https" URLs. For example, loading this scheme from other secure schemes will not trigger mixed content warnings.

member.name: P:Chromely.Core.ChromelySchemeHandler.IsCorsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether is cors enabled. If true the scheme can be sent CORS requests. This value should be true in most cases where IsStandard is true.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether use default http.

member.summary: Gets or sets the w param.

member.summary: Gets or sets the l param.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.AsyncWindowPosition
member.summary: If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window. This prevents the calling thread from blocking its execution while other threads process the request.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.DeferErase
member.summary: Prevents generation of the WM_SYNCPAINT message.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.DrawFrame
member.summary: Draws a frame (defined in the window's class description) around the window.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.FrameChanged
member.summary: Applies new frame styles set using the SetWindowLong function. Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed. If this flag is not specified, WM_NCCALCSIZE is sent only when the window's size is being changed.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoActivate
member.summary: Does not activate the window. If this flag is not set, the window is activated and moved to the top of either the topmost or non-topmost group (depending on the setting of the hWndInsertAfter parameter).

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoCopyBits
member.summary: Discards the entire contents of the client area. If this flag is not specified, the valid contents of the client area are saved and copied back into the client area after the window is sized or repositioned.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoMove
member.summary: Retains the current position (ignores X and Y parameters).

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoOwnerZOrder
member.summary: Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoRedraw
member.summary: Does not redraw changes. If this flag is set, no repainting of any kind occurs. This applies to the client area, the nonclient area (including the title bar and scroll bars), and any part of the parent window uncovered as a result of the window being moved. When this flag is set, the application must explicitly invalidate or redraw any parts of the window and parent window that need redrawing.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoSendChanging
member.summary: Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message.

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoSize
member.summary: Retains the current size (ignores the cx and cy parameters).

member.name: F:Chromely.Core.Host.WinapiConstants.NoZOrder
member.summary: Retains the current Z order (ignores the hWndInsertAfter parameter).

member.name: T:LitJson.IJsonWrapper
member.summary: The JsonWrapper interface. Interface that represents a type capable of handling all kinds of JSON data.This is mainly used when mapping objects through JsonMapper, and it's implemented by JsonData

member.name: T:LitJson.JsonData
member.summary: The json data. Generic type to hold JSON data (objects, arrays, and so on). This is the default type returned by JsonMapper.ToObject().

member.name: T:LitJson.JsonException
member.summary: The json exception. Base class throwed by LitJSON when a parsing error occurs.

member.name: T:LitJson.JsonMapper
member.summary: The json mapper. JSON to .Net object and object to JSON conversions.

member.name: T:LitJson.JsonMockWrapper
member.summary: The json mock wrapper. Mock object implementing IJsonWrapper, to facilitate actions like skipping data more efficiently.

member.name: T:LitJson.JsonReader
member.summary: The json reader. Stream-like access to JSON text.

member.name: T:LitJson.JsonWriter
member.summary: The json writer. Stream-like facility to output JSON text.

member.name: T:LitJson.Lexer
member.summary: The lexer. JSON lexer implementation based on a finite state machine.

member.name: T:LitJson.ParserToken
member.summary: The parser token. Internal representation of the tokens used by the lexer and the parser.
